description: Arbroath score three goals in 22 second-half minutes as they came back to earn a draw with Elgin.
title: Arbroath 3-3 Elgin City
maintext:
Arbroath scored three goals in 22 second-half minutes as they came back to draw with Elgin.
Shane Sutherland scored either side of half time before Brian Cameron made it 3-0 to the visitors.
Arbroath hit back thanks to a Paul McManus header and Richard Little reduced the deficit further.
Robert Linn then earned the hosts a share of the spoils with a goal four minutes from time, firing home from inside the box.
